alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:24AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Charles, northeastern Lafourche and west central Jefferson Parishes through 215 AM CDT... At 124 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boutte, or near Hahnville, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Larose, Paradis, Luling, Boutte, Ama, Bayou Gauche, Destrehan, Taft, New Sarpy, St. Rose, Norco, Des Allemands and Killona. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 2 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
